DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct assess effect normal saline cefazolin irrigation incidence SSIs . Hypothesis : Normal saline cefazolin irrigation decrease incidence SSIs .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Cefazolin Normal Saline Irrigation Surgical Site Infections ( SSIs )
DOC.detailed_description: All pregnant woman underwent cesarean 6 hour pass rupture membrane attend Shariati Hospital Bandarabbass eligible study .
DOC.criteria: pregnant woman 6 hour pass rupture membrane need undergo cesarean allergy penicillin allergy cefazolin history immunosuppressive drug use gestational diabetes mellitus preeclampsia
